title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams

courseOutline.title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams
courseOutline.description: This course is designed to help new remote tech employees get started with Microsoft Teams by covering essential features and functionalities.
courseOutline.goal: Onboard remote tech employees to Microsoft Teams

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to what Microsoft Teams is and its importance in remote work.

sections.title: Why Use Microsoft Teams?
sections.description: Discuss the benefits of using Microsoft Teams for communication and collaboration.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Account
sections.description: Guide on how to create and configure a Microsoft Teams account.

sections.title: Customizing Your Profile
sections.description: Instructions on personalizing your profile in Teams for better identification.

sections.title: Navigating the Interface
sections.description: Exploration of the main interface and navigation tools within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Understanding Channels and Tabs
sections.description: Explanation of channels, tabs, and how to use them effectively for organization.

sections.title: Chat Basics
sections.description: Introduction to the chat feature including one-on-one and group chats.

sections.title: Voice and Video Calls
sections.description: Guide on making voice and video calls within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Scheduling Meetings
sections.description: Instructions on how to schedule meetings, invite participants, and manage meeting settings.

sections.title: Working with Files
sections.description: Explanation of how to share files, collaborate on documents, and use the file storage features within Teams.
